Attributes.description: Ecology, function, history and conservation of tropical systems. Focus on ecological and evolutionary principles using tropical landscapes as a geographic template. Assessment of factors that make tropical systems vulnerable to degradation. Research project development using analysis of tropical ecology literature.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: BIOL 121 and one of BIOL 230, FRST 201, GEOS 207, GEOB 207.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon Wed, Start Time: 11:00, End Time: 12:00, Building: To, Room: Be
